ygData.subject: Re: PVP
ygData.msgSnippet: i a necro on pvp but i never heard you aren t allowed to cast DOT spell on PCs. i dont really know though cuz i have never PKed anyone or got PKed yet. i do
ygData.messageBody:
i a necro on pvp but i never heard you aren't allowed to cast DOT spell on
PCs. i dont' really know though cuz i have never PKed anyone or got PKed
yet.

i do heard, however...that death resulting from another player's pet or DOT
will cuase u to lose xp which is a bug.

∩┐╜D∩┐╜∩┐╜: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] PVP


>From: "Shadow Panther" <shdwpanther@...>
>
>
> I've been considering starting a Necromancer on the PVP server, but I
>wasn't aware we couldn't use our DoT spells. Is it this way for every
>class? I'm sure the Necromancer isn't the only one that can Poisen, after
>all. ....... or is it? That'd be odd.
>
> After the discussion on Int and finding out how low my char's 90 Int
>really is, I'm seriously thinking about starting over, anyway. Perhaps
>it'll be on the PVP server and I'll see how it goes. Not sure yet, though,
>as what I'll do.
>
> That's odd, how they wouldn't allow a DoT Spell, such as Poisen, to
>effect the player victem in PVP. Heck, I'd even allow the rooting
>underwater, as that could easily be worked into role-play, but, I totally
>understand a limitation on that. Snerts would take advantage of that a bit
>too much.;)
>
> I wonder just how a Necro defends theirself in PVP?
>
>~Mysk
>
>
